title: The League Alpha Client
body:
Riot, once again you have far exceeded my expectations, just got invited to test out the alpha client today and I can tell you its everything I ever dreamed for.

http://imgur.com/0L1FrrT
Looks Stunning

http://imgur.com/Gw5Akcq
Now you can always view the latest patch notes in the client itself!

http://imgur.com/N1wQtFh
Store looks good as usual

http://imgur.com/ZpfyRob
Hextech Crafting!

http://imgur.com/SrMvvyP
The best thing ever, YOUR BACKGROUND BECOMES YOUR TOP CHAMP

http://imgur.com/fVTuQz4
Cool match overview with detailed statistics

http://imgur.com/yTZ6Ak7
Very cool design, I like it

http://imgur.com/xuKbgT9
Just wow, great effort put into the runes page!

http://imgur.com/pRYVZ6w
Still looks like a lot of work-in-progress but I'm eager to try out some games!

http://imgur.com/YwdEO7q
This is what I like a lot, but I'm still curious, what is training? I'm curious to find out...

replies.body: Glad you're enjoying it man! continue giving feedback through the in client avenues =D
Training has always been available. It's really basic AI + lots of Tips.

I'm not too sure that's what it means, especially after this was just announced 
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/road-pre-season-practice-tool-works

Training is an introduction to League of Legends, where as Practice Tool is like Sandbox but mainly for practising game mechanics without the strain of levelling up, obtaining items or waiting for cooldowns

LOL i can't wait until ur hopes are smashed. Like yes yes its a beautiful client but your game will be glitchy, buggy unoptimised and just unpleasant. Thats the feedback i've heard from others anyways.
So far no bugs, nothing has been glitchy and everything is working fine so sorry to burst YOUR bubble but I'm having a fun time

actually, i used that client since it only had normal game compatability, it is less buggy than the old client and the client has no effect on the game itself, they are different things.

so any bugs that exist with say renekton w will still be there, but the bug i had with not being able to type in champ select, crash on launching game, creating game, etc are gone.
why do you run heal snowball on draven

I've been waiting for months now

Ever since they released the post saying "More testers wanted"

rip me
You're so lucky, my friend also got invited to try it :)
Would love to experience this but still waiting to be accepted  :(
In ranked selection it fails to give permission for others to invite, works for 2, then no others.  Also the start didn't start the match.

its much better then the old one in my opinion!
